plot: Yuzuru, a poor highschool girl is chosen to be "Honey" - a female companion to an influential male student who becomes her "Master". She can't refuse, or she'll be expelled, but doesn't like her Master Kai. However, he may not be that bad.
title: Mitsu x Mitsu doroppusu 1
plot_es: Yuzuru, a poor highschool girl is chosen to be "Honey" - a female companion to an influential male student who becomes her "Master". She can't refuse, or she'll be expelled, but doesn't like her Master Kai. However, he may not be that bad.
plot_en: Yuzuru, a poor highschool girl is chosen to be "Honey" - a female companion to an influential male student who becomes her "Master". She can't refuse, or she'll be expelled, but doesn't like her Master Kai. However, he may not be that bad.
